name: System Irrelevant
description:
In System Irrelevant you finally get to work the job of your dreams! Sort documents into 3 different organizers or just toss them below the table, answer phone calls, please your boss 😉

All dialogue has full voice acting, so playing with audio is encouraged.

Controls

Just the mouse!

  • Left Click: Drag and Drop, Interact
  • Right Click: Close Detail View
This game was created for  Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 Therefore it follows the Theme Thanks to

Henkekalmar for  "Tired" and "ICWiener" voice lines 

Klein-Eller for  Betties voice lines

Coffee for background music and Vlads voice lines

Cyklan for Bossmans and other voice lines, graphics and programming

NoctusRex for Mikes voice lines and programming

Existing resources used from

https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/paper/

https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/phone/

https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/write/

https://www.soundjay.com/phone-sounds-2.html

https://wintergatan.net/collections/download/products/whoosh-sound-effects-winte...

https://www.onlinewebfonts.com/download/8d223b3ad8d4819e9dcf22757e4cc2c4

Source Code

This game was made with the MonoGame framework in C#. Poke through the source of this and our previous games here:

https://github.com/CodeArcade/BrackeysGameJam2021.2
